snippet: Kent Desormeaux, who will ride Guyana Star Dweej in the Belmont Stakes, is a Hall of Fame jockey who has lost big mounts recently.
abstract: Profile of Hall of Fame jockey Kent Desormeaux, who will ride Guyana Star Dweej in the Belmont Stakes; Desmormeaux's personal struggle with alcoholism has cost him big mounts over the years.
lead_paragraph: Kent Desormeaux, who will ride Guyana Star Dweej in the Belmont Stakes, is a Hall of Fame jockey who has lost big mounts recently.

headline.seo: Desormeaux, Battling Alcoholism, Fights to Stay in Horse Racing
headline.main: Fighting to Stay in Game While Battling Alcoholism
headline.print_headline: Fighting to Stay in Game While Battling Alcoholism
